channel.title: tvos Tutorial on
channel.description: Recent content in tvos Tutorial on

item.title: Getting started with tvos
item.description: Example for TVML app # For starting tvOS I assume must have knowledge of swift and iOS app. One can start reading article from apple reference document. There are 2 type of Tv app we can create one is traditional app, i.e created in xcode code would be similar as we do in iOS app. Here we take example of other type of tv app it’s called Client server app
